rooms.name: Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: Spacious living area with open concept design incorporating large windows and natural light, adhering to Vastu principles by orienting the room towards the east.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen integrated with Brutalist design elements, located in the south-east to promote positive energy as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment
rooms.description: Main studio apartment area combining bedroom and living space, with a lofted section for additional storage or relaxation.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Small utility room for laundry and equipment, positioned in the south-west to balance energies as per Vastu.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large entrance with reinforced concrete fa√ßade, designed for durability and in alignment with Brutalist architecture. The north orientation is favored by Vastu for entry.

openings.name: Windows
openings.description: Large openings on the east and south walls to maximize natural light and maintain a balance of energy according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with built-in storage and a private balcony. The west orientation is considered for restful energy.

rooms.name: En Suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom attached to the master bedroom, featuring minimalistic Brutalist design elements and practical fixtures.

rooms.name: Studio Office / Workspace
rooms.description: Functional workspace area designed with ample lighting for productivity. The north-west orientation is preferred as per Vastu to encourage focus.

openings.name: Balcony
openings.description: Open balcony area for relaxation, offering views over the irregular plot and pool area. Designed with minimalist concrete elements.

openings.name: Roof Deck
openings.description: A flat roof deck serving as a communal outdoor space that overlooks the swimming pool and surrounding landscape, designed in a Brutalist style with raw concrete finishes.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool
rooms.description: A modern swimming pool integrated into the irregular plot, designed with clean lines and a minimalist aesthetic. The water element is balanced with surrounding greenery.

openings.name: Pool Entrance
openings.description: Accessible pool entrance designed for ease and safety, aligned with the plot's irregular geometry and ensuring privacy.
